original: MUNTERS, Carl Georg, Civilingenjör, Stocksund, f Dala-Järna 22/3 97 av ing A M o Hilma Helling, gm Anna Geralf. Studex Sthlm 17, ex KTH 22. Uppf tills m B von Platen Platen-Munters (Elektrolux) kylskåp, syssels m utveckl av detta i Platen-Munters Refri-gerating System AB Sthlm 23—35, etabl Munters’ ind.AB Sthlm. Styr.led i sistn AB, AB Partia, AB Termisk isolation, Ulvsunda spec.-maskiner AB (samtl Sthlm). Resor: Sydamer, USA, Tyskl, Egnl mfl länd fr 25. Av trycket: Om alstring av kyla (tills m B von Pl 25). VA, AdelskM, Sv tekn.frns PolhemsM, The Franklin Inst John Price Wetherhill M. "MtiULER, Hugo Robert, Disponent, Konsul, Gävle, f Zwickau 7/10 83, gm Kristina Kilman. Skolstud i Borås, Vänersborg o Leipzig. Anst v Kilsunds AB Borås, vkst dir f Gefle Ångväfveri AB sed. 12, styr.ordf sed. 29. Styr.led i AB Sjuntorp, Textilind.frb, Gävle Köpm.frn, Sundsvalls Ensk Bks avd.-&ont. Flm i hdlskamm sed. 29. Lettisk konsul.
translated:
MUNTERS, Carl Georg, Civil Engineer, Stocksund, b. Dala-Järna 22/3 1897, son of engineer A M and Hilma Helling, m. Anna Geralf. Graduated in Stockholm in 1917, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1922. Involved in the development of refrigerators at Platen-Munters (Electrolux), employed at Platen-Munters Refrigerating System AB in Stockholm from 1923 to 1935, then established Munters’ industrial AB in Stockholm. Board member in the latter company, AB Partia, AB Termisk isolation, Ulvsunda spec.-maskiner AB (all in Stockholm). Traveled to South America, USA, Germany, England, and other countries from 1925. Published a work on the production of cold (co-authored with B von Pl, 1925). Received the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences' Gold Medal, Adelsköld Medal, Swedish Technical Association's Polhems Medal, The Franklin Institute John Price Wetherhill Medal. 

"MtiULER, Hugo Robert, Manager, Consul, Gävle, b. Zwickau 7/10 1883, m. Kristina Kilman. Studied in Borås, Vänersborg, and Leipzig. Employed at Kilsunds AB in Borås, then became the managing director of Gefle Ångväfveri AB since 1912, served as chairman of the board since 1929. Board member of AB Sjuntorp, Textilind.frb, Gävle Köpm.frn, Sundsvalls Ensk Bks avd.-&ont. Joined the trade chamber in 1929. Latvian consul."

awardFor.name: Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences
